entry.title: ROSEBURG MISSES RECORD HIGH TEMPERATURE
entry.summary: September 17, 2023 6:30 a.m. Roseburg missed setting a new record high temperature for the date Saturday, but not by much. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said the mercury reached 92 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The record high for September 16th was 93 degrees, set in 2008. Temperatures are starting to cool...

entry.summary: Riddle Roots Community Projects is moving forward on the Riddle Activity Center Capital Campaign by hosting a kick-off event Tuesday. The event will be held at the future grounds of the activity center from 2:30 to 7 p.m.
